hurricane.sentence: A category 5 hurricane made landfall, causing widespread destruction and flooding in the coastal city.
The hurricane caused massive tidal surges, destroying homes and businesses along the shoreline.
Strong winds from the hurricane knocked down power lines, leaving many residents without electricity.
Torrential rains from the hurricane caused flash floods, leading to road closures and evacuations.
The hurricane caused widespread damage to crops and livestock, affecting the local agriculture industry.
High winds from the hurricane damaged several offshore oil rigs, leading to oil spills and environmental concerns.
The hurricane caused a widespread power outage, affecting hospitals and essential services.
The hurricane disrupted transportation and communication, making it difficult for aid organizations to reach affected areas.
The hurricane caused severe beach erosion, affecting the tourism industry and local economy.
The hurricane caused widespread damage to infrastructure, making it difficult for residents to return home.

earthquake.sentence: A magnitude 7.5 earthquake struck the city, causing widespread destruction and panic among residents.
The earthquake caused several buildings to collapse, killing and injuring many people.
Strong aftershocks from the earthquake continued for several days, causing additional damage and fear.
The earthquake caused widespread power outages, leaving many residents without electricity.
The earthquake disrupted transportation and communication, making it difficult for aid organizations to reach affected areas.
Landslides triggered by the earthquake blocked roads and damaged homes in the mountainous regions.
The earthquake caused severe damage to historic and cultural landmarks, affecting the local tourism industry.
The earthquake caused severe damage to infrastructure, including bridges, highways, and utilities.
The earthquake caused a tsunami, causing additional damage and loss of life in coastal areas.
The earthquake caused widespread damage to schools, hospitals, and other public buildings, affecting the local community.
